name: roadtohealth (Group) Limited
goal:
Quealth is a highly validated, evidence-based health improvement intervention that focuses on the prevention of five leading non-communicable diseases - cancer, cardiovascular disease, diabetes, dementia and COPD.

The health journey comprises five interactive modules - health assessment, health planning, health coaching, health tracking and health motivation, which seamlessly integrate to provide an engaging, empowering and efficacious user experience designed to help individuals adopt and maintain positive health behaviours which in turn improve their health, wellbeing and vitality.

In assessing the health, wellbeing and objectives of an individual, Quealth collects a rich and diverse range of over 300 individual data items covering areas such as biometrics, lifestyle, diet, psychological health, environmental factors, personal medical history, family history and genetics.

Quealth is highly accessible to mass international populations through it’s delivery as an iOS and Android smartphone app and has already achieved over 70,000 downloads worldwide since launching in October 2015, principally in the UK and Europe, the United States and Australia.

In order to drive Quealth’s global accessibility, we have collaborated with three of the world’s largest technology organisations in distribution / promotion partnerships which will significantly drive downloads over the next 6 to 12 months through exposure to a global population in excess of 100 million potential users.
euInitiatives:
Regulation and guidelines relating to:

1. the development of health-related apps
2. the control, processing and storage of data related to health and lifestyle matters
3. information standards for health-related apps
